items.sentence: Tom certainly seems to be apprehensive about something.
You need to get everyone in your class to vote for you.
If we've got to do it, then we'd better do it properly.
Do you know the name of that beautiful girl over there?
I haven't been to Boston yet, but I've already met Tom.
Tom has two dogs. One is black, and the other is white.
Why don't we try doing this the way that Tom suggested?
If I'd had a map, I probably wouldn't have gotten lost.
Could you tell me where can I buy another one of these?
The world's largest telescope is in the Canary Islands.
Tom said he doesn't think doing that is worth his time.
Did you feel the earthquake last night around midnight?
I didn't like Tom at all the first time that I met him.
I'd like to thank everyone who helped me get this done.
I can afford neither the time nor the money for a trip.
Even though I put on sunscreen, I got really sunburned.
The difference between you and me is that I have class.
Tom, Mary, John and Alice all have one thing in common.
Tom wanted Mary to play his favorite song on the piano.
Tom started talking much earlier than most children do.
